body_html:
replaced
with slim.arg_scope([slim.variable], device='/cpu:0'):
with
with slim.arg_scope([slim.model_variable, slim.variable], device='/cpu:0'): as shown in model_deploy

The variables are now created on cpu:0 and ops on respective gpu's

Thanks @pranavvm26 and @sguada
body_text:
replaced
with slim.arg_scope([slim.variable], device='/cpu:0'):
with
with slim.arg_scope([slim.model_variable, slim.variable], device='/cpu:0'):  as shown in model_deploy
The variables are now created on cpu:0 and ops on respective  gpu's
Thanks @pranavvm26  and @sguada
body:
replaced 
`with slim.arg_scope([slim.variable], device='/cpu:0'):`
with 
`with slim.arg_scope([slim.model_variable, slim.variable],
                         device='/cpu:0'):`  as shown in [model_deploy](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/deployment/model_deploy.py)    

The variables are now created on cpu:0 and ops on respective  gpu's

Thanks @pranavvm26  and @sguada
